availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Cordelia Ann Russell Clark (Marion County, Kentucky, resident. )

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, resident. Marion County, Kentucky, native. Daughter of Elias Russell and Elizabeth Russell. Married to Thomas Jefferson Clark. Mother of Frank Clark, Martha E. Clark, Henrietta Clark, and Steve Clark. Resident of Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States(1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p. 354A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon, p. 545.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Raywick, p. 149B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States(1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Raywick, p. 139A.
"Cordelia Ann Russell Clark (1834-1870)," Find A Grave, Memorial #30511027, accessed August 29, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/30511027.
